downloadTitle: FY13 HTGG BPIO Collaboration Information Access Partner Deck
downloadDescription: How to get going guidance to help customer move from one maturity to another
detailsSection: Once the customer has been profiled using the IO profiling tools, or In-Depth assessments have been done to identify areas where a customer can move from one IO model stage to the next (Basic through Dynamic); use this guide to follow up on IO profiling and In-Depth Assessment, to identify specific projects that will help customer make the transition.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
